sections.heading: fair board; internal election; proxy vote prohibited
sections.text: The vote of a member of a county fair board for any election held within such board shall be cast by the member personally and shall not be cast by a proxy vote.SourceLaws 1992, LB 398, ยง 3;Laws 1997, LB 469, ยง 30.

2-240.County fair board; internal election; proxy vote prohibited.

The vote of a member of a county fair board for any election held within such board shall be cast by the member personally and shall not be cast by a proxy vote.

SourceLaws 1992, LB 398, ยง 3;Laws 1997, LB 469, ยง 30.
